name: Breaking Down
description:
LD39 - JAM entry - Running out of Power.

Breaking Down is a game where you need to complete the level before the lights run out of power while collecting the traditional coins (it is all about that money :) ), but to be a bit unfair you can’t jump. Be thoughtful of your timing and move around using the moving platforms and ladder.

PS: there are a total of 3 levels only implemented, and the game will loop back to level one after you finish all the ones available. Didn’t got to implement the ‘you beat the game, best gamer ever’ kind of refreshing screen message, so if you feel déjà vu have that in mind.
